ValidationRule.description: Â DCP-31209:Line item End date should be within Agreement Start date and End date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT($Permission.Bypass_CLM_Validation_Rule), $Profile.Name <> 'Integration Sales SnapLogic', LOWER( $User.Username ) <> LOWER('autoproc@' & CASESAFEID($Organization.Id)), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__AgreementId__r.Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c)), Apttus_CMConfig__EndDate__c > Apttus__AgreementId__r.Apttus__Contract_End_Date__c, TEXT(Apttus_CMConfig__LineStatus__c) <> $Label.AgreementLineItemLineStatusExisting )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Line item End date should be within Agreement Start date and End date
